fullText: ive 3 months love holds music videos pictures trouble videos little didnt videos purchased online quick builtin speaker isnt loud headphones external speakers comes av cables plug tv stereo changing song menu occasionally freeze 12 isnt issue havnt data lose batterie lasts week 1 hour bus ride id suggest buying 20 dollars watch alot videos awsome amazon unbox video downloads transfered amazon video player conclude love happy purchase cool access internet play games purposes price perfect
